title: Kasvisravintola Karpalo
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Buffet, Salad bar, European, Finnish
description: Est. Dec 2012. Serves a vegan lunch buffet which consists of soups, salads and warm dishes. Non-vegan item is honey (jar labeled "hunaja") for tea on the self-service table. Need to check whether cookies and cakes contain honey or not. Also sells some packaged foodstuff. Space can be reserved for parties and events.
